languages.text: "И когда отступит беда — я разделю с вами еще тысячи мгновений, любовь моя".
"And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."
languages.original_text: "И когда отступит беда — я разделю с вами еще тысячи мгновений, любовь моя".

traits.locale_text: "And when trouble recedes, I will share a thousand more moments with you, my love".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And when trouble recedes, I will share a thousand more moments with you, my love".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “当危机结束之后，我将与你共度千千万万美妙时光，我的爱人。”
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."

traits.locale_text: “当危机结束之后，我将与你共度千千万万美妙时光，我的爱人。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Y cuando solucionemos estos problemas, compartiré un millar de momentos más contigo, amor mío».
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."

traits.locale_text: «Y cuando solucionemos estos problemas, compartiré un millar de momentos más contigo, amor mío».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「問題が終結すれば、さらに長い時間をあなたと共に過ごすことにします」
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."

traits.locale_text: 「問題が終結すれば、さらに長い時間をあなたと共に過ごすことにします」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und wenn der Ärger sich zurückzieht, werde ich noch eintausend weitere Augenblicke mit Euch teilen, mein Schatz."
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."

traits.locale_text: "Und wenn der Ärger sich zurückzieht, werde ich noch eintausend weitere Augenblicke mit Euch teilen, mein Schatz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Et quand la paix reviendra, nous partagerons mille autres moments, mon cœur. »
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."

traits.locale_text: « Et quand la paix reviendra, nous partagerons mille autres moments, mon cœur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ve sıkıntılar ortadan kaybolduğunda seninle bin an daha paylaşacağım sevdiğim."
languages.original_text: "And when trouble recedes, I shall share a thousand more moments with you, my love."
